interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Judge Dredd [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2019/12/24
Store: Sylvester Stallone  (Actor),     Diane Lane  (Actor),     Danny Cannon  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ['Prepare yourself for the nonstop, action-adventure thrill ride JUDGE DREDD -- exploding onto Blu-ray for the first time, featuring an all-new digital restoration with enhanced picture and sound. Academy Award(R) nominees Sylvester Stallone (Best Actor, 1976, ROCKY) and Diane Lane (Best Actress, 2002, UNFAITHFUL bring the story of a legendary comic book hero to life. In a time when all-powerful "judges" act with supreme authority of both the police force and legal system, Judge Dredd is the most feared law enforcer of them all. When a former judge devises a sinister plot to bring him down, Dredd with stop at nothing to even the scales of justice!']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'DREDD, SYLVESTER, STALLONE, Action/Adventure, JUDGE', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Armand Assante, Max Von Sydow, Danny Cannon, Rob Schneider, Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Jurgen ProchnowArmand Assante, Max Von Sydow, Danny Cannon, Rob Schneider, Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Jurgen Prochnow  See more', 'Language': 'French (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS-HD High Res Audio), Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '25524900', 'Director': 'Danny Cannon', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 18, 2012', 'Actors': 'Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Armand Assante, Jurgen Prochnow, Rob Schneider', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Studio': 'HOLLYWOOD PICTURES', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: What can I say? It's Stallone...with Armand Assante, Joan Chen (hubba, hubba) and Rob Schneider, et al. For me, the scene where Schneider is mimicking Stallone on the way to the penitentiary-"I am the law", still has me rolling on the floor. Cheap thrills, but, I like it.
Review Title: This one was a "guilty" pleasure for me.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

The Sapphire Collection (Braveheart/Gladiator/Saving Private Ryan) [Blu-ray]
Mel Gibson  (Actor, Director),     Russell Crowe  (Actor),     Ridley Scott  (Director),     Steven Spielberg  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["Three of the most critically acclaimed and influential movies of our time in one Blu-ray collection. With 15 Oscar wins between them - This is the set that should be part of everyone's collection. The Sapphire Collection includes: Gladiator, Saving Private Ryan and Braveheart."]

Three great movies for a low price.
Good buy for the price.

I got this for the "Wild Bunch", the fact that two other classic westerns were included was icing on the cake.
Great buy for the money.
Judge Dredd [Blu-ray]
Sylvester Stallone  (Actor),     Diane Lane  (Actor),     Danny Cannon  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['Prepare yourself for the nonstop, action-adventure thrill ride JUDGE DREDD -- exploding onto Blu-ray for the first time, featuring an all-new digital restoration with enhanced picture and sound. Academy Award(R) nominees Sylvester Stallone (Best Actor, 1976, ROCKY) and Diane Lane (Best Actress, 2002, UNFAITHFUL bring the story of a legendary comic book hero to life. In a time when all-powerful "judges" act with supreme authority of both the police force and legal system, Judge Dredd is the most feared law enforcer of them all. When a former judge devises a sinister plot to bring him down, Dredd with stop at nothing to even the scales of justice!']
{'Genre': 'DREDD, SYLVESTER, STALLONE, Action/Adventure, JUDGE', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Armand Assante, Max Von Sydow, Danny Cannon, Rob Schneider, Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Jurgen ProchnowArmand Assante, Max Von Sydow, Danny Cannon, Rob Schneider, Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Jurgen Prochnow  See more', 'Language': 'French (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS-HD High Res Audio), Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '25524900', 'Director': 'Danny Cannon', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 18, 2012', 'Actors': 'Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Armand Assante, Jurgen Prochnow, Rob Schneider', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Studio': 'HOLLYWOOD PICTURES', 'Number of discs': '1'}
What can I say? It's Stallone...with Armand Assante, Joan Chen (hubba, hubba) and Rob Schneider, et al. For me, the scene where Schneider is mimicking Stallone on the way to the penitentiary-"I am the law", still has me rolling on the floor. Cheap thrills, but, I like it.
This one was a "guilty" pleasure for me.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user continues to favor historical and war-themed films while also exploring the action genre, particularly enjoying projects featuring notable actors like Sylvester Stallone. Their taste leans toward films that combine entertainment with engaging and sometimes lighter storytelling elements.

- **Director & Actor Affinity:** The user maintains an interest in esteemed directors such as Mel Gibson, Ridley Scott, and Steven Spielberg, while also embracing films led by Stallone and other prominent actors. This suggests a balance between appreciating serious narratives and enjoying star-driven action films.

- **Format Preference:** The user remains committed to high-quality media formats, specifically Blu-ray, demonstrating a consistent desire for enhanced visual and audio experiences, even when engaging with lighter, action-focused content.

- **Value Consciousness:** The user continues to seek value in their purchases, evident in their satisfaction with well-priced items that offer strong entertainment value. Their latest purchase reflects this strategy, as they describe it as a guilty pleasure worth having.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user consistently rates products highly, showcasing a positive reception towards their selections. Their latest review underscores a blend of quality appreciation and enjoyment for more lighthearted cinematic experiences.

The user exhibits an evolving taste in cinema that balances impactful storytelling with an enjoyment of guilty pleasures in action films, all while seeking high-quality formats and value-driven selections.
